item.title: Greta Thunberg's Gaza flotilla hit by drone, organisers claim
item.description: Global Sumud Flotilla says a fire was started but Tunisian authorities deny that a drone was involved.

item.title: More than 20 dead in Russian attack on Ukrainian village, Zelensky says
item.description: A Russian air strike on a village in eastern Ukraine's Donetsk region has killed multiple civilians, President Zelensky has said.

item.title: Murdochs reach deal in succession battle over media empire
item.description: Lachlan Murdoch will retain control of the conservative Fox and News Corp empire under the deal.

item.title: US lawmakers release Epstein 'birthday book' with alleged Trump note
item.description: The White House says the president did not draw the picture or sign the note, after it was published on Monday.

item.title: At least 10 dead after train crashes into bus in Mexico
item.description: An investigation is under way after a freight train hit a bus as it tried to cross railway tracks.
